channel.title: Life on Just Do it
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Just Do it

item.title: A letter to youyou luling
item.description: I was going to publish the original , but then i thought about it , the content was just too real and moving for me to put it out here. so forget it. Pretend there is text here. Dear Mr. Deer ... ... Borrow your motto: 日拱一卒，只为苍生说人话 Share with you.
